review: The  current digital age  has spoiled the millennial with streaming music, games and movies usually dedicated on expensive gaming consoles and smart tvs and tablets. Entering into the arena of a la cart entertainment is Amazon with it's plug and play Fire stick. Once you plug the device into your hdmi outlet, coupled with a WiFi connection, you are treated to a plethora of entertainment options for the whole family. Fromgames to movies, music and more, this is all built into thepowerful slick piece of tech at an affordable price. Favorites like Netflix, Hulu, Pandora , there is plenty of entertainment to be enjoy for the whole family. Highly Recommended.
author: michael haynes

review: Firestick has made a smart TV out of my "Plain Jane" model. It was simple to install, very easy to use once I learned to change input sources on my set, and it opened up an entire world of commercial-free programming that met my specific viewing criteria; easily one of the best entertainment investments I've ever made.
